noun.description: A quick, clever reply to an insult or criticism.
A quick return thrust following a parry.

verb.description: Make a quick, clever reply to an insult or criticism.
examples: “I'd have made lamb chops had I known you're a vegetarian,” Kris riposted

verb.description: Make a quick return thrust in fencing.

origin: Early 18th century: from French risposte (noun), risposter (verb), from Italian risposta response.
